name: N8n
longDescription: N8n is an extendable workflow automation tool. With a fair-code distribution model, n8n will always have visible source code, be available to self-host, and allow you to add your own custom functions, logic and apps. n8n's node-based approach makes it highly versatile, enabling you to connect anything to everything.
description: N8n (pronounced n-eight-n) helps you to connect any app with an API with any other, and manipulate its data with little or no code.
